summary: Responses use paging_metadata instead of pagingMetadata.
Description advertises content=reference/path but projection only supports metadata/value.
Query endpoints are not implemented for repositories/registries.
Async bulk status/result endpoints are not implemented.
AASX validator exists but is not enforced on upload/import.
DELETE endpoints generally do not enforce If-Match preconditions.
Responses default to application/json rather than aas-specific media types.
URI regex for PathType is relaxed vs RFC3986 to satisfy pydantic-core.
